attributes.action: Keep the Solar Pyramid project in Derbyshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It was reported recently the Solar Pyramid which was to be built in Poolsbrook Country Park in Derbyshire, is now to be moved to Poole in Dorset.  

I think the Government should help in some way to keep the pyramid project in Derbyshire.  

The aim of the structure was to act as a landmark to over look the motorway and to provide solar powered energy to homes in nearby Poolsbrook.
